text: Ten homes participate for one month saving electricity.  The home that saves the most gets a prize as well as the coveted "BIGGEST GREENIE" title.

attachments.text: Coach is always around giving you hints and tricks to help you win.
A new game begins the first Monday of the month.  We install an Energy Monitor in your home before the game begins.
